lead_paragraph: Brian McBride beat Tim Howard, his former teammate on the United States national team, with a 67th-minute header, and Fulham used all five of its American players in a game for the first time in defeating visiting Everton, 1-0, in the English Premier League. McBride, Fulham’s captain, started along with goalkeeper Kasey Keller and Eddie Johnson. Defender Carlos Bocanegra entered in the 74th minute, and Clint Dempsey replaced McBride in the 88th.
